item.title: Distribution: Masters
item.description:
<a href="/distribution/file-loads/masters/agencies/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Agencies</h3> <p>Create and configurate your agencies</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/file-loads/masters/offices/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list-ul"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Offices</h3> <p>Create and configurate offices for your agencies</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/file-loads/masters/hotels/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-building"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Hotels</h3> <p>Create and update your hotels</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/file-loads/masters/hotel-info/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-picture-o"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Hotel Info</h3> <p>Add extra information to your hotels: images, descriptions.
[...]

item.title: Distribution: Rules
item.description: <a href="/distribution/file-loads/rules/general-rules/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-cogs"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">General rules</h3> <p>Configurate general rules and filters by different conditions</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/file-loads/rules/temporary-pricing-rules/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-money"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Temporary pricing rules</h3> <p>Apply commissions or markups for different market conditions</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/file-loads/rules/general-stop-sales/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-ban"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">General stop sales</h3> <p>Define general stop sales by different conditions</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/file-loads/rules/specific-stop-sales/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-ban"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Specific stop sales</h3> <p>Define specific stop sales by different conditions</p> </div> </div> </a>
